brainly_data.question: Kevin is hanging out with his friends at the mall when he bumps into his ex-girlfriend and her new boyfriend. he is devastated. he feels like his heart has been torn open, and he is on the verge of tears. although he has only said "hi" to her, he believes that his friends, his ex-girlfriend, and her new boyfriend can clearly see his heartache. this phenomenon is known as
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: Hes not over it and he wants his gf back
